description: The ultimate ultralight waterproof biking jacket. Weighing just 99g (Size M) it's an exceptionally packable, breathable, protective layer, with a silicone grip drop hem and refined sleeve fit. Take it every ride and stash in frame attachable sack.
name: Rab Cinder Phantom Jacket - Mens

specs.key: 7D Pertex® Shield 2.5L fabric with stretch (40 g/m²) HH
